abstract: DealBook Online; Nomura reaches settlement with Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena over failed multimillion-dollar derivative transaction.
lead_paragraph: In the agreement with Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena over a 2009 derivatives deal that went bad, Nomura, of Japan, denied any wrongdoing.

headline.main: Settlement With Italian Bank to Cost Nomura $287 Million
